description: Fifth column sequence of triangle A062138 (generalized a=5 Laguerre).
links: Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: E.g.f.: (1+36*x+216*x^2+336*x^3+126*x^4)/(1-x)^14.a(n)=A062138(n+4, 4) = (n+4)!*binomial(n+9, 9)/4!.If we define f(n,i,x)= sum(sum(binomial(k,j)*stirling1(n,k)*stirling2(j,i)*x^(k-j),j=i..k),k=i..n) then a(n-9)=(-1)^(n-1)*f(n,9,-5), (n>=9). [From _Milan Janjic_, Mar 01 2009]
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
